entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
